name: dev.ucp.shopping.catalog
title: Catalog
description: Product catalog search and item retrieval capability.

intent.description: Background context for semantic search (e.g., 'looking for gift under $50', 'need something durable for outdoor use').

context.description: Location and market context for catalog operations. Extends base context with 'intent' for semantic search.

filters.description: Filter criteria to narrow results. All specified filters combine with AND logic.

category.description: Filter by product category. Categories are merchant-defined strings representing product taxonomy. Valid values can be discovered from the category field in search results, merchant documentation, or standard taxonomies that businesses may align with.

price.description: Price range filter in minor currency units. Currency determined by country.

messages.description: Errors, warnings, or informational messages about the search results.

product.description: The product containing the requested ID. For product ID lookups, variants may contain a representative set. For variant ID lookups, variants contains only the requested variant.

messages.description: Errors, warnings, or informational messages about the requested item.
